text: Carmen Ranigler (born 17 August 1976) is an Italian snowboarder. She was born in Bolzano. She competed at the 2006 Winter Olympics, in snowboard cross and parallel giant slalom. She competed in parallel giant slalom at the 2010 Winter Olympics. == References == == External links == * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Italy Category:Snowboarders at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Snowboarders at the 2010 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bolzano
title: Carmen Ranigler
